item.description:
Pintu's Indian Restaraunt offers some of the best Indian food in the region.

It is my favorite restaraunt, and according to some of my East Indian friends, the closest they have gotten to "home cooking" in a restaraunt setting.

The quality of the food is excellent, and the presentation delightful. Pintu himself often is visible, and may even seat you at your table (he takes a lot of pride in his restaraunt and the service provided). Rarely have I ever left a restaraunt eating my fill, and yet feeling light and energized. And the prices are very affordable considering the quality of food and service. A rare gem in the Springfield area.
item.name: Pintu's Indian Restaraunt West Springfield
